result.title: Introduction
result.content:
Hello Everyone,

It is apparent that our performance in the world finals has never been good enough to be comparable to teams from other regions, our champions are always the champions with the least solved problems with a huge margin from champions of other regions.

To change that, we are starting a new method of practice. Instead of limited camps, we will be starting a practice league from this week and till the week before the world finals. This will require persistence, hard work and a lot of your time and efforts.

Ahmad Mamdouh, Mahmoud Radwan and me (Omar ElAzazy) will be the managers for this practice.

Our responsibilities are:

  • Provide problems of high quality that serve our practice purposes

  • Provide solutions for them

  • We will do our best assisting you

  • Make sure the practice is not hindered by anything

The plan for the practice:

  • There will be a contest every 2 weeks

  • The first week will be for you to try as hard as possible in the problems

  • Problems will be added in the first week on daily basis (problems will not be added all at once in the beginning of the first week)

  • Editorials will be posted in the second week with discussions about the problems

  • In the second week you continue solving any problem you haven't solved already

  • Additional problems might be added in the second week

  • Additional thing is that, as long as you have no reason not to, you must participate in all Topcoder SRMs and Codeforces rounds. Don't worry about your ratings and ranks, just participate in all of them, this is important for you to experience other factors that are not covered in our practice, like time pressure, speed, ... etc They are different across different contests but still it is useful to enter those online contests to work on these factors.

The plan is bound to change at anytime the managers feel that there is a better way to do it, you can mail us your suggestions too.

The practice structure:

  • You have already been invited to a Codeforces private group

  • Editorials, tutorials and notes will be added to the group's blog

  • Contests will be held on different websites, each contest will be announced in the beginning of it's first week.

  • Discussions will be held as comments on the blog or if it is a long one, it can be held in a chat.

This whole practice idea is solely to improve our performance at the world finals and get much better ranks. It is expected from members in this practice to devote so much of their time and effort for the practice and based on that there are some rules to follow.

Rules:

  • At anytime if 2 managers agree that a member is slacking off, (s)he will be given a notice and on a second notice (s)he will be removed form practice

  • By the end of the first week, every member must have at least read all problems and ready to discuss them

  • You must be committed to this practice regardless of any other practice running

  • This practice should be a secret among us

Please think about this as our summed up efforts to do something better at the world finals. It is our responsibility to be able to do this for our region.

Best Regards,

Managing Team
